landing.heroSubtitle: Digital time tracking for hospitality, retail and services. Automatic compliance with Spanish labor law.

cta.readySubtitle: 14-day free trial. No credit card required.

landing.valueSpeedDesc: Clock in within 2 seconds from your phone. QR, geofence or PIN.
landing.valueComplianceDesc: Automatically compliant with Art. 34 of the Workers' Statute.
landing.valueSimpleDesc: No training needed. Your employees use it from day one.
landing.personaEmployeeDesc: Clock in with one tap. See your shifts and hours instantly.
landing.personaManagerDesc: Live attendance, approve with a swipe, create schedules in minutes.
landing.personaHRDesc: Export payroll, manage contracts and multi-site compliance.
landing.personaInspectorDesc: Read-only access to verifiable records with SHA-256 chain.
landing.step1Desc: Create your organization in 2 minutes. Add locations and employees.
landing.step2Desc: Your employees clock in via QR, geofence or PIN from their phone.
landing.step3Desc: The system automatically verifies hours, breaks and legal limits.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Simple and transparent. No surprises.
pricing.trialNote: 14-day free trial. No credit card required.

faqItems.a: Yes. Since 2019, Royal Decree-Law 8/2019 requires all companies to record their employees' working hours. Torre Tempo complies with all legal requirements.
Yes. The app works offline and syncs clock-ins when the connection is restored. No clock-in is ever lost.

faqItems.q: Can I export the data for my payroll provider?
faqItems.a: Yes. Export in CSV format compatible with Sage, A3, Meta4 and other payroll systems.
You set a radius around each location. Employees can only clock in when they're within the area.

faqItems.q: What happens if a labor inspector requests the records?
faqItems.a: Torre Tempo generates read-only access tokens for ITSS inspectors. Every record has SHA-256 verification.
You can be up and running in under 10 minutes. Create the organization, add employees and start clocking in.
No. Monthly billing with no commitment. You can cancel anytime.
Yes. Personal data is encrypted with AES-256-GCM. We comply with Organic Law 3/2018 on Data Protection.
